title: Self-Directed Information Integration Categorization Learning and Strategic Thinking Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and data categorization experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based adaptive learning schedules for working professionals: Experimental activities enhance information synthesis capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can integrate three or more dimensions of information (e.g., numerical magnitude, color density) to develop optimal classification strategies.
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of information integration strategies and rule-based strategies in fatigue conditions to select context-appropriate approaches.
Learners can experimentally demonstrate that information integration accuracy improves by over 15% with repeated practice at 24-hour intervals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
